entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • directory.getfiles does not take advantage of the index #59126
  • Uncorrect output on my PC on C# language #59125
  • Process.Start doesn't work in . Net5 #59124
  • DataContractSerializer cannot deserialize unknown property containing CDATA when implementing IExtensibleDataObject #59123
  • Loading of XML files fails when using prefix for long paths #59122
  • Different results .Net 5.0 and .Net 6.0 on AES Crypto #59121
  • .Net 5: For Thai, IndexOf(string) returns wrong index for some strings #59120
  • Add `DateOnly` and `TimeOnly` string body parameter support #59118
  • IXCLRDataMethodInstance.GetILAddressMap is broken in .NET 6 RC1 #59109
    6.0.0
  • Figure out an alternative to startup hooks for dev-time scenarios such as hot reload #59107
  • X509Certificate2.GetNameInfo(SimpleName) with non-ASCII data on Linux returns oddly encoded results. #59105
    7.0.0
  • Performance regression in JsonSerializer.Deserialize(Stream) for very small types like Int32 #59103
  • Potential performance regression in ConcurrentDictionary #59101
  • [API Proposal]: UriCreationOptions #59099
    7.0.0
  • Internal CLR errors during delay load when using crossgen2 in composite mode with method layout #59089
  • Potential performance regression in OrdinalIgnoreCase string comparision #59087
  • SocketException (10060) in HTTP 1.1 stress tests #59086
    7.0.0
  • Hosting .NET Core using nethost and hostfxr - Finding nethost.dll on client machine #59082
    Future
  • System.AccessViolationException in System.Exception.ToString() #59077
    7.0.0
  • Unable to use wrapper types with built-in validation attributes #59076
  • Regressions in System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTests #59093
    7.0.0
  • Regression in Utf8ParserTests #59094
    6.0.0
  • JIT not able to inline some simple generic methods marked as AggressiveInline #59075
    Future
  • Test Failure Interop\\COM\\ComWrappers\\GlobalInstance\\GlobalInstanceMarshallingTestsBuiltInComDisabled\\GlobalInstanceMarshallingTestsBuiltInComDisabled.cmd #59072

Closed

  • Marshal.GetHINSTANCE(module) works on Windows but not on Linux/OSX #59020
    Future
  • `Segmentation fault (core dumped)` at runtime in ARM64 self-contained application #57534
    6.0.0
  • Mono GC crash in CI #58062
    6.0.0
  • [mono/llvm] Outdated attribute name #58998
    6.0.0
  • New rule suggestion: Warn against using Uri as a key #59011
    7.0.0
  • [MacOS] EXC_CRASH (SIGABRT) when GC occurs from within a callback made out of an Dispatch queue: com.apple.root.default-qos thread #58111
    6.0.0
  • HTTP/3 without AppContext switch doesn't give descriptive error #58971
    7.0.0
  • Consider adding Socket Send/ReceiveAsync overloads that elide SocketFlags argument #43934
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58654
    6.0.0
  • ASP.NET Core 5.0 issues with CORS policy for specific origins #59095
  • System.Drawing - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58653
    6.0.0
  • [MemoryCache] Add possibility to disable linked cache entries #45592
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54862
    6.0.0
  • Android + Console.WriteLine + format strings = possible unexpected extra newlines #57304
    7.0.0
  • [System.Net.Http.Json] System.Net.Http.Json - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58750
    6.0.0
  • The actual `ExceptBy` and `IntersectBy` APIs differ from the approved APIs #58756
  • Global Mutex #55169
    Future
  • Backport `UseConsoleLifetime()` fix from net6 to net5. #59014
  • Very sluggish VS 2019 and VS 2022 performance starting with DotNet 6 Preview 5 related to Source Generators #56702
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into feature/use-dllimport-generator #59119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Require UTF8 encoding in GetX509NameInfo #59116
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Bump intellisense version to RC1 (main) #59115
    documentation, * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Undo breaking change compat in GetMethodNativeMap #59114
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #59113
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #59112
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [Tell-mode][release/6.0] Use arcade power source build infra #59108
  • [WIP] Avoid resetting gen0 bricks for background_sweep #59106
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove exception messages from resource strings #59104
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Update the branding to GA #59102
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Handle file-scoped namespaces (#57894) #59100
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] Emit diagnostics & exceptions for sourcegen handling init-only properties & JsonInclude attributes #59097
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods #59096
    area-System.Drawing
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Update attribute name used for controlling frame pointer elimination #59091
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix race condition with cancellation tokens in Read/Flush operations #59090
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [release/6.0] Use caching ConsoleStream for both iOS and Android #59088
    area-System.Console
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
  • CI matrix change: drop OSX 10.13 #59084
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Process.Unix: handle ETXTBSY error when executing file that was just written by .NET. #59079
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Align preallocationSize behavior #59078
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Multi-target Json and Logger Source Generators between Roslyn v3.11 and v4.0 (#58446) #59074
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Remove some redundant threading tests, move some cases to libraries tests #59073
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Remove benign assert #59044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Update DllImportGenerator to the latest version #59117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/6.0] Fix EventPipe sample profiler resolution on Windows. #59056
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Use SROA-friendly struct type declarations #59007
    runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Eliminate PROJECTK_BUILD from RF #59057
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Update attribute name used for controlling frame pointer elimination #59069
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Use arcade power source build infra #58651
    area-Infrastructure
  • Change macOS activatin injection failure handling #59045
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Elide SocketFlags in Socket API #57634
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [WASM] Enabled strict mode on all JS files #54011
    arch-wasm
  • [release/5.0] Add Fedora 36 RID #57703
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Support JsonExtensionData in STJ source-gen #59047
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Change PKCS12 password to assist with credscan #59080
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Extend MemoryCacheOptions with TrackLinkedCacheEntries #57648
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Fix broken API proposal template link #59083
    area-Meta
  • Add missing docs to System.Text.Json #59053
    documentation, area-System.Text.Json
  • Add missing System.Linq API docs #59038
    documentation, area-System.Linq
  • Use caching ConsoleStream for both iOS and Android #58967
    area-System.Console
  • UpdateJson and CompilerServices.Unsafe versions #59067
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Align preallocationSize behavior #58726
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Fix circular dependency in WasmAppBuilder #58905
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix pause on exception behavior #58895
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] [tvOS] Be less eager in creating the non-existent special folders #59024
    area-System.Runtime, os-ios
  • [release/6.0] Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58390
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection
  • Multi-target Json and Logger Source Generators between Roslyn v3.9 and v4.0 #58446
    area-Extensions-Logging

Updated

  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete dead code #56865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Remove duplicates from the AOT data blob. #58982
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #58913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Optimize thread state transition #58992
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [WASM] Adding a new switch to run wasm on NodeJS #54640
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use getpwuid(3) in corehost for the $HOME-less user #59036
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • JIT: simple VN budget stress mode #59051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Relax assert to check for simd8 or return type #58966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update source-gen APIs according to review #59042
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • Runtime changes for DetectPreviewFeaturesAnalyzer #59062
    area-System.Runtime
  • Allow users passing FILE_FLAG_BACKUP_SEMANTICS as FileOptions #58854
    area-System.IO
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Single-file apps should not use copy-on-write mapping of the .exe on windows. #59033
    area-Single-File
  • Allow contained indirections in tailcalls on x64 #58686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix SendAsync from inpersonificated context with default credentials #58922
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Create and publish missing symbols #58866
    area-Build-mono
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix underestimation of temps size #58969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • Share init-compiler with arcade #59018
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Fix corner-case handling of cancellation exception in ForEachAsync #59065
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 6.0.0
  • CI matrix change: ubuntu + mac #58987
  • [WIP] [HTTP/3] Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Refactor XmlWriter{Async} #58105
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [MonoVM] Reduce P/Invoke GC transition asserts in release builds #59029
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Use unsigned casts for array/Span indexers #57970
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use SROA-friendly struct type declarations #59060
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 6.0.0
  • Use live-built corehost on s390x for creating testhost #58952
    area-Infrastructure
  • RID work for macOS 12 #59066
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Initialize compCurBB during fgInsertGCPoll #57334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Remove SupportedOSPlatforms windows on Hosting WindowsServices #59064
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Crossgen2 when assemblies has circular … #58268
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
